name: Nezuko Running Youtube Progress Bar
description: This one is based on the original that doesn't work, it might not look the best.

user.name: DittoDino
user.about:
Ello there, I know basic HTML and CSS, though HTML is where I'm more advanced in, I'm also considering making multiple custom youtube progressbars, if you got any ideas for them, just message them in the discussion area and I'll see what I can do. 
My alt is BoopBop, made exclusively for roblox styles.

additional_info: If there are any techinal issues, just comment in the discussion and clearly state the problem, credits to ZaTaisho for the original nezkuo running gif, also if you want to make nezuko bigger, just comment below and I'll resize the image. Update Notice Version 0.4 ~ October 7th 2021 It's better now. Version 0.3 ~ September 16th 2021 Resized the gif to be on top of the progress bar. Version 0.2 ~ September 4th 2021 Bug fixed
